summary: April 20 is the 110th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
John Patrick Amedori  is an American actor and musician. He is perhaps best known for his portrayal of the thirteen-year-old Evan Treborn in The Butterfly Effect.
Amedori has also appeared in a number of television shows, including Law & Order, Nip/Tuck, Joan of Arcadia and Ghost Whisperer, as well as a part in the film Stick It. In 2006, Amedori starred in Fox's drama series Vanished, and in 2008 was cast as Aaron Rose in Gossip Girl as a love interest of Serena van der Woodsen and the stepbrother of Blair Waldorf.
title: John Patrick Amedori
